p: To obtain the best possible estimates of dark diversity in China, we used Beals probability index ( Beals, 1984), as recommended by Lewis, Szava-Kovats & Pärtel (2016). This index can be used to estimate the probability of a species occurring in a particular region based on its co-occurrence within other regions and was calculated using the package “vegan” ( Oksanen et al., 2016) in R ver. 3.3.1 ( R Development Core Team, 2016).
